content.rendered:
INTERNATIONAL EVENTS

The range of tourist scenarios that Mexico has, from natural and cultural to large cities, as well as the warmth of its people, make it the ideal country to carry out high-impact events at an international level.

The most important sports fairs in the world have been held in some Mexican destination, in addition, our country has received the greatest exponents of international art, culture and entertainment. All this powered by the great infrastructure that Mexico has for its performance.
